name: The Game of Truth
description:
- The adventure of a doctor who enters the mind of his patient to bring him back to reality.

- Reality is the state of things as they are, rather than as they are imagined to be, or the things that exist in the real world right?

- But there are some people who don’t perceive the world as most of us,  my job is to go inside their minds and bring them back to reality.
